name: TreatmentFieldsForRadiationTherapy
title: Treatment fields for radiation therapy
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains ICD-9 codes associated with Treatment fields for radiation therapy.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients with Treatment fields for radiation therapy.),(Inclusion Criteria: ICD-9 codes associated with Treatment fields for radiation therapy are included in this value set.),(Exclusion Criteria: Codes not associated with Treatment fields for radiation therapy are excluded from this value set. Codes captured in systems other than ICD-9 are also excluded from the value set.)
